| PFDTBT_5Per |
| PFDTBT_10Per |
| PFDTBT_20Per |

Let's think step by step.

| PFDTBT_20Per |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here are the valid entities that refer to material properties in the given paragraph:

| Property Name |
| --- |
| PFDTBT |
| PFDTBT_5Per |
| PFDTBT_10Per |
| PFDTBT_20Per |

Note that "peak and edge positions" and "maximum absorption peak" are not material properties, but rather properties of the material's optical absorption spectrum. Therefore, they have been excluded from the list.
